name: PicoRoots
description:
"Pico-Roots is an adventure game where you control a plant trying to reach a seed at the bottom of a level. You must grow roots to navigate through the soil and avoid obstacles such as rocks. The plant must also balance its hydration levels by absorbing water and avoiding dehydration. The player must collect vitamins scattered throughout the level to ensure the plant's growth and survival. "Pico-Roots" tests your skills and strategy as you try to reach the coveted seed.

Btw, thanks to these people for making this game possible:

Hodge - thank you for the beautiful soundtracks and really cool sound effects!

Rowan - thank you for all of the art that you did!

MBoffin - thank you for helping me with debugging!
